ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: - Writing skills - Close reading - Film analysis

I greatly improved my writing by learning how to better structure and organize my papers and how to more concisely and coherently express my ideas. I also learned how to do a close reading and how to gather information for a research paper.
English 114 helped me build upon my critical writing skills. I learned to look at things on a deeper level and synthesize effective arguments as a writer.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: I enjoyed the readings and discussions during class, and I thought it was helpful when we made lists and diagrams on the board to illustrate a certain point or idea. I thought the writing workshops were very helpful and allowed students other than the author of the paper to be engaged in the revision process. I also enjoyed the individual conferences and thought those were very helpful. Near the end of the course, we didn't follow the syllabus as strictly, so sometimes it was unclear what we had to do as readings until we received an email, which was a little stressful.
i lied the size of the class and the student engagement and sharing ideas

The small number of students in this class allowed for great discussions of the topics at hand. The four essays targeted different aspects of writing and helped me improve my skills in several different forms of writing.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes. The topic was interesting and it is one of the few opportunity where the professor expects you to gradually improve your skills.
Yes, for anyone who needs help with becoming more confident writing essays
Yes, this course is a great way to improve your writing skills, and the readings and content of the course are very interesting.
yes helped with college level writing
Yes, this course is a good introduction to college-level writing that will help you throughout your time at Yale. You will become a better writer and be able to created effective pieces of work.
Yes but you have to be willing to put in the work!
